score = global.get("score4")
global.set("points", score)

msg.payload={
    "company_name": flow.get("company"),
    "job_applied": flow.get("job_applied"),
    "email": msg.payload.Email,
    "name": msg.payload.NAME,
    "dob": msg.payload.DOB,
    "gender": msg.payload.Gender,
    "points": score
}
return msg;

name: Two dimension array table
format:
JOB TITLE DESCRIPTION LOCATION COMPANY NAME TO APPLY
{{row.JOB_TITLE}} {{row.DESCRIPTION}} {{row.LOCATION}} {{row.COMPANY_NAME}} Apply Now

func:
var des = []
flow.set('des',msg.payload)

msg.payload ={
    "COMPANY_NAME":msg.payload.company,
    "JOB_TITLE":msg.payload.job_title,
    "DESCRIPTION":msg.payload.description,
    "LOCATION":msg.payload.location,
    "REPORTING POSITION":msg.payload.rep_pos,
    "SKILLS":msg.payload.skills,
    "QUALIFICATIONS":msg.payload.highest,
    "REQUIREMENTS":msg.payload.requirements,
    "WEEKENDS":msg.payload.weekends,
    "WORK TIMINGS":msg.payload.timings,
    "ONSITE":msg.payload.on_site
}
return msg;
